attributes.action: re negotiate Child Support Laws with regards to the Non Resident Parent & Child Tax Credits & Child Benefit when working out the non resident parents maintenance assesments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently Child Tax Credits & Child Benefits are used by the Child Support Agency as other money coming in when calculating the Non resident parents assesment. Surely this is wrong as the Non Resident parents children with his new family are being penalised by the C S A.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
